did.unittitle: Letter from Theodore Dreiser to Murrel Cain 8 February 1916
Letter from Theodore Dreiser to Murrel Cain 17 February 1916

scopecontent.p: Theodore Dreiser, Savannah, to [Murrel Cain]. Asks if she loves him; asks her to have good picture taken and send bill to him; plans to go to Indianapolis to write while she is there and find out if she really cares.
